mapper.insert: insert into visible_foreign_matter_check (RIQI_DATE, DANJ_NO, DANW_ID, ZHIJ_STAFF, FUJ_STAFF, CAOZ_STAFF, HOUSE_ID, ZHIJ_STAFF_ID, FUJ_STAFF_ID, CAOZ_STAFF_ID) values (to_date(#{RIQI_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{DANJ_NO}, #{DANW_ID}, #{ZHIJ_STAFF}, #{FUJ_STAFF}, #{CAOZ_STAFF}, #{HOUSE_ID}, #{ZHIJ_STAFF_ID}, #{FUJ_STAFF_ID}, #{CAOZ_STAFF_ID})

insert into GSP_KJYWJC_MX (DANJ_NO, HANGHAO, SHANGP_ID, LOT, NUM, CHOUY_NUM, CHUJ_RESULT, CHUJ_ADVISE, CHUJ_BHGL, FUJ_RESULT, FUJ_ADVISE, FUJ_BUHGL, KJYW_NUM_CJ, KJYW_NUM_CJQT, FJ_NUM, KJYW_NUM_FJ, KJYW_NUM_FJQT, CHECK_RESULT, YEZ_ID) values (#{DANJ_NO}, #{HANGHAO}, #{SHANGP_ID}, #{LOT}, #{NUM}, #{CHOUY_NUM}, #{CHUJ_RESULT}, #{CHUJ_ADVISE}, #{CHUJ_BHGL}, #{FUJ_RESULT}, #{FUJ_ADVISE}, #{FUJ_BUHGL}, #{KJYW_NUM_CJ}, #{KJYW_NUM_CJQT}, #{FJ_NUM}, #{KJYW_NUM_FJ}, #{KJYW_NUM_FJQT}, #{CHECK_RESULT}, #{YEZ_ID})
